stanza.line: For shame deny that thou bear love toany
Who for thy self art so unprovident
Grant if thou wilt thou art beloved ofmany
But that thou none lov is most evident
For thou art so possessed with murdrous hate
That gainst thy self thou stick not toconspire
Seeking that beauteous roof to ruinate
Which to repair should be thy chiefdesire
O change thy thought that I may change mymind
Shall hate be fairer lodged than gentle love
Be as thy presence is gracious andkind
Or to thy self at least kind hearted prove
Make thee another self for love ofme
That beauty still may live in thine orthee
